marklogic.body: Completely worthless article - if the 3 hits 116 degrees on Infinity Blade then it hits 116 degrees...period. Who cares that you can play some other game without problems. Generating 116 degrees for long periods of time is both uncomfortable for the user and limiting to the life of the hardware. Watch the hardcore Ipad 3 gamers returning their broken Ipads to the store for replacement in the near future. I wouldn't be surprised if Apple changed the terms of their warranty to omit coverage for Heat-related problems like this.
